name: THE DEATHMATCH
description:
Who will win? who will stay alive for a long? PLAY NOW 

pick a weapon before 20 seconds

a simple PVP game for two players

CONTROLS P1:

A,D=MOVE 

G=JUMP

H=FIRE

CONTROLS P2:

ARROWS=MOVE

NUMPAD 1=JUMP

NUMPAD 2=FIRE

NOTE:i made this game in three days one for sprites,other for coding,and final for  creating map and uploading
